name: Tomato Basil Penne Pasta
description: This Tomato Basil Penne Pasta is perfect for anyone looking for healthy, flavorful meal options. Tagged as 'Healthyfied', 'Healthy Recipes', and 'Healthified Recipes', it's crafted to support a nutritious diet without sacrificing taste.
recipeIngredient: 2  cup (4.7 oz) cooked, Cooked Penne Rigate

recipeInstructions.text: Start by chopping 1 cup of red onion and setting aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare 0.12 cup(s) of basil leaves by washing and roughly chopping them.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Next, measure out 2 tablespoons of garlic pepper grinder.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Cook 125 grams of fresh ground pork in a pan over medium heat until fully cooked, breaking it apart with a spatula, about 10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, boil water in a large pot and cook 2 cups (4.7 oz) of Penne Rigate according to the package instructions until al dente, then drain.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: In a large skillet, saut√© the chopped red onion with the prepared garlic pepper grinder over medium heat until the onion is translucent, about 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7

recipeInstructions.text: Add the cooked pork, halved tomatoes, and cooked Penne Rigate to the skillet. Stir well to combine. Let it cook for another 5 minutes to let the flavors meld.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 8

recipeInstructions.text: Remove from heat and stir in the chopped basil leaves. Serve warm.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 9
